QuestData.Title: Bloody Wages
QuestData.Description: Sad little cowards... look at them flee in panic!$B$BDon't let it fool you, $n. The second they've regained their wits, those goblins are going to spend every waking moment chopping this forest to bits and sending the pieces to the Horde's war effort.$B$BDon't give them the chance. Kill the workers throughout Irontree Clearing without mercy... show them their greed has a price!
QuestData.RewardText: Serves every last one of them right. Let's hope those in charge send the rest of their greedy scavengers somewhere else.
